Vitoast

Vue Toast Package

Vitoast is a simple and customizable toast package for Vue.js, designed to provide user-friendly notifications.

Customizable

Vitoast allows you to customize the appearance

Types

Supports different types of toasts including success

Duration

You can specify the duration for which the toast should be displayed
